---
page_title: "Data Source: auth0_connection_profile"
description: |-
  Retrieve information about an Auth0 connection profile.
---

# Data Source: auth0_connection_profile

Retrieve information about an Auth0 connection profile.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) ID of the connection profile.

### Read-Only

- `connection_config` (List of Object) Connection configuration for the profile. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--connection_config))
- `connection_name_prefix_template` (String) Template for generating connection names from the profile.
- `enabled_features` (List of String) List of enabled features for the connection profile.
- `name` (String) Name of the connection profile.
- `organization` (List of Object) Organization associated with the connection profile. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--organization))
- `strategy_overrides` (List of Object) Strategy overrides for the connection profile. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--strategy_overrides))

<a id="nestedatt--connection_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `connection_config`

Read-Only:



<a id="nestedatt--organization"></a>
### Nested Schema for `organization`

Read-Only:

- `assign_membership_on_login` (String)
- `show_as_button` (String)


<a id="nestedatt--strategy_overrides"></a>
### Nested Schema for `strategy_overrides`

Read-Only:

- `ad` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--strategy_overrides--ad))
- `adfs` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--strategy_overrides--adfs))
- `google_apps` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--strategy_overrides--google_apps))
- `oidc` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--strategy_overrides--oidc))
- `okta` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--strategy_overrides--okta))
- `pingfederate` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--strategy_overrides--pingfederate))
